description: The border remains an "integral part" of the Manx defences against Covid-19, the chief minister says.
title: Coronavirus: 'Not the moment' to reopen Manx border
title_page: Coronavirus: 'Not the moment' to reopen Manx border - BBC News
maintext: He also said it was hoped a third one-month extension to the island's state of emergency, which came into effect on Monday, could be revoked by 23 June.
